author: Gabby Landsverk and Hilary Brueck
title: Can homemade face masks help limit the spread of the coronavirus? Scientists can't agree, but here's what you need to know.
description: The White House may soon recommend that all Americans wear masks, and some US cities like Los Angeles and Laredo, Texas are fining people who don't cover their faces during the coronavirus pandemic. But the public has also been urged to avoid buying medical m…
content:
The White House is expected to announce a nationwide recommendation that all Americans wear masks to help slow the spread of the novel coronavirus across the nation.
In Laredo, Texas, officials announced residents could be fined up to $1,000 for not wearing … [+10222 chars]
